job_title: Junior System Engineer / Sub Assistant Engineer (Telecom & IT Solutions)
job_description: Junior System Engineer / Sub Assistant Engineer (Telecom & IT Solutions) : Systems & Services Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Systems & Services Limited Junior System Engineer / Sub Assistant Engineer (Telecom & IT Solutions) Application Deadline : 06 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 4 Age: 22 to 28 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 05 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 28 years Basic understanding of telecommunications and network engineering principles Good analytical, problem-solving, and teamwork skills. Practical knowledge of electrical and network systems. Eager to learn and grow within the telecom engineering domain. Responsibilities & Context We are seeking dynamic, motivated, and technically sound individuals to join our engineering team as Junior System Engineers / Sub Assistant Engineers . These roles are tailored to candidates with a BSc in Electrical & Electronic Engineering (EEE) and Diploma in EEE respectively, and are designed to support our technical operations across design, implementation, installation, and support of telecommunications and IT solutions. This is an excellent opportunity for early-career engineers to grow in a professional environment working on real-world telecom, network, and IT infrastructure projects. Key Responsibilities Assist in site surveys, installation, commissioning, and testing of telecommunications and network solutions. Support in design and implementation of network systems and equipment following technical specifications. Troubleshoot, maintain, and optimize system performance of hardware and software components. Provide technical support and after-sales service for client systems, ensuring high uptime and quality performance. Prepare technical documentation, reports and assist with project coordination . Collaborate with senior engineers and cross-functional teams to ensure timely project delivery. Keep up-to-date with industry trends, new technologies, and best practices in telecom and IT solutions. Skills & Expertise communication and interpersonal skill. Computer Literacy Customer Support Design and Drawing Electrical and Electronic Engineering Hardware & Networking Hardware Troubleshooting IT Support Service and Network engineering. Network Troubleshooting Telecommunication Engineer Suggested by Hardware & Networking Design and Drawing Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Company Information Systems & Services Limited Follow Address: Tropical Cantt View (3rd floo

To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Minimum 3–5 years of professional experience as an Accountant in the education consultancy sector or any relevant agency/field. Responsibilities & Context Maintain accurate records of financial transactions. Prepare financial reports, statements, and bank reconciliations. Proficient in MS Office tools, especially Excel (formulas, data analysis, spreadsheets). Experience in data management and reporting tools. Manage accounts payable and receivable. Oversee payroll processes, budgeting, and expense tracking. Ensure compliance with financial regulations and internal policies. Assist in audits and financial forecasting. Collaborate with other departments to ensure financial clarity and reporting accuracy. Monitor daily financial operations such as invoicing, billing, and bank  transactions. Analyze financial data and provide insights to support business decisions. Strong command over accounting principles and financial reporting. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Strong leadership and interpersonal skills. High attention to detail and excellent organizational abilities. Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks with tight Skills & Expertise Suggested by Accounting Finance Tally Software Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Company Information Victoria Healthcare Ltd Follow Address: Cosmopolitan Center, 22/2, Babar Road, Block-B, Mohammadpur, Dhaka-1207. Counsellor/ Senior Counsellor : Classic Education Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Classic Education Group Counsellor/ Senior Counsellor Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka (DOHS Mohakhali) Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Additional Requirements Responsibilities & Context Classic Education Group is a leading student consultancy firm dedicated to guiding students through the complexities of university admissions. We pride ourselves on providing personalized support and expert advice to help students achieve their academic and career goals. Job Description: The Counsellor/senior counsellor is responsible for guiding students/clients through the overseas education or migration process. This role includes providing accurate program advice, assessing applicant eligibility, maintaining client communication, ensuring quality documentation, and achieving monthly conversion targets. The senior counsellor also supports junior counsellors through training, supervision, and performance guidance. Provide expert counselling to students regarding university options, course selection, and career pathways. Assist students in preparing and submitting university applications, scholarship applications, and visa documentation. Manage the end-to-end student journey: initial consultation, document assessment, SOP review, GTE, tests, interviews, personal statements & visa lodgement Guide students through the admission process, including application preparation, documentation, and submission. Conduct information sessions, seminars, and workshops for prospective students and parents. Respond to student inquiries through various communication channels, including in-person meetings, phone calls, and emails. Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill,Tour allowance,Performance bonus Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Competitive salary and benefits package. 
Opportunities for professional development and growth. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only females are allowed to apply. Brand & Event Promoter (Male & Female) : Jagoron Centre for Development Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Jagoron Centre for Development Brand & Event Promoter (Male & Female) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 10 Age: 18 to 28 years Location: Dhaka (Uttara Sector 8) Salary: Tk. 7000 - 10000 (Monthly) Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 18 to 28 years Flexible part-time schedule – perfect for students or youth. Gain hands-on experience in marketing, event promotion & brand communication. Build professional networks with school & college authorities. Be part of a national educational mission impacting thousands of students. Earn valuable experience in student outreach, branding & promotion. Responsibilities & Context As a Brand & Event Promoter , you will be the face of our English Genius Program for students of Class 1–12 . Your mission is to reach students, inspire them, and help them join our educational movement. Key Responsibilities: Visit schools & colleges to promote the program. Meet Head Teachers & Principals to introduce the program and gain support. Distribute flyers, brochures & program materials to students. Ensure new student enrollment and active participation. Achieve part-time sales & recruitment targets . Submit daily reports and updates on your visits and activities. Manager – Land & Legal : Premium Holdings Ltd Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Premium Holdings Ltd Manager – Land & Legal Application Deadline : 26 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 35 to 45 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 24 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 45 years Experience 8 to 10 years in relevant fields The applicants should have experiences in the following business area(s): Real Estate, Asset Development, etc. Additional Requirements Strong knowledge of Land Law, Civil Law, other related activities. Expert to land survey. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Good command of MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Internet. Deep knowledge of land law and registration process Excellent Negotiation skills Document analysis skills (invoices, forms, deeds, etc.) Fluency in both English & Bangla (written and verbal). Responsibilities & Context Workplace Work at office and projects Responsibilities & Context Prepare all land related documents properly. Supervise all land registration processes. Confirming mutation, name transfer, land development tax payment etc. Verifying land ownership (title verification). Verifying land records, parcels, mouza maps, dag numbers. Verifying ownership history, khatian, mutation, survey reports, and other necessary papers. Drafting various legal documents, including contracts, deeds, MoUs, affidavits, business agreements, wills and agreements with landowners, developers, & stakeholders etc. Ensuring agreements align with company policies and mitigate potential risks. Maintaining legal records, preparing periodic reports, and updating management on ongoing cases. Prepare reports and provide updates to management. Any other tasks as and when assigned by the management. Compensation & Other Benefits Performance bonus Yearly increments Two festival bonuses Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Premium Holdings Ltd Follow Address: Gulshan Grace (5th Floor), H# 08, R# South Avenue, Gulshan-1, Dhaka-1212 Business: PREMIUM HOLDINGS LTD. PREMIUM HOLDINGS LTD, one of the fastest growing conglomerates with significant presence in the real estate industry offering a wide range of real estate products and services PREMIUM HOLDINGS LTD. is a progressively growing organization provides every citizen of Bangladesh to own a housing destination within affordable capacity and reasonable price with all available facilities in its different projects. PREMIUM HOLDINGS LTD. pledge to create pleasant, enjoyable, safe and secured residential environment for the honorable customers. Premium Holdings ltd careful enough to keep the commitments made to the customers.
